example.eg: He had a pain in his leg after the game.
We had to go through a lot of pain to get to where we are in life.
example.egtrans: 我们必须经历相当多的悲痛才能过上我们现在的生活。

example.eg: It pains me to see you do embarrassing things like that.
example.egtrans: 看着你做那样尴尬的事情，真让我痛苦。

example.eg: That guy is such a pain.  I don't want to go out with him again.
example.egtrans: 那家伙真是个讨厌鬼。我不想再和他出去。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 讨厌的人，讨厌鬼, 讨厌的事情，麻烦的事情

example.eg: The excellent reviews of my book have rewarded all the pains I took in researching and writing it.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 巨大的努力, 大量的工作

example.eg: When the pains are coming five minutes apart, it is time to call the midwife.
Fiona felt an acute pain in her right leg.

dsense.name: agonizing pain, also UK: agonising pain

example.eg: The agonizing pain of the injury caused her to scream uncontrollably.
The patient has been suffering from severe body pains.
My mother is suffering from bone pain; she can't move her legs because it hurts so much.
As a nurse, I sometimes had to perform procedures that caused people pain.
Although I didn't want to cause him pain, I felt that I had no choice but to tell him about his wife's infidelity.
A heart attack causes chest pain.
Each time the cramp returned he would scream and double up with pain.
Scientists do not agree on whether insects feel pain.
He's just jumping into adolescence and he's trying to deal with the growing pains.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 成长的烦恼, 成长遇到的痛苦

example.eg: The first year of operation has been full of adjusting to the growing pains of the business.
I hate seeing my daughter in pain.
She was in pain after her neck injury.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 遭受疼痛, 疼痛不已

example.eg: Torture is designed to inflict pain on somebody.
example.egtrans: 折磨是为了给人造成痛苦。

dsense.name: lower back pain
dsense.guideword: (discomfort in lowest part of the back)

example.eg: Poor posture can result in lower back pain.

dsense.name: no pain, no gain, no pain without gain
dsense.guideword: informal (it is worth making an effort)

dsense.name: pain in the ass (US), pain in the arse (UK)
dsense.guideword: vulgar, figurative, slang (source of annoyance) (比喻，俚语)

example.eg: My boss is always looking over my shoulder and is starting to become a real pain in the ass.
example.egtrans: 老板总是在身后监视我，简直成了我的“肉中刺”。

example.eg: Filling out the forms for my recent insurance claim was a real pain in the neck.
example.egtrans: 填写保险索赔表格真的好烦人。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 烦恼的来源，烦恼的根源, 眼中钉，肉中刺

example.eg: She was prescribed painkillers after her surgery.
I took a pain pill for my headache.
This app's limited functionality on certain operating systems is a pain point with customers.
She has a very high pain threshold.
The sharp pain in his chest indicated a possible heart attack.
James went to the emergency room because of the shooting pains in his back.
I'm suffering pain in all my joints, Doctor.
He suffered much pain following the death of his wife.
I've had a throbbing pain in my arm all day long.

dsense.name: writhe in pain, writhe in agony

trans_examp.trans_cn: 疼痛得扭动着身体, 疼得打滚
